Author: vlad
Content: If Amazon required every new customer to login before they could view their selection of products starting tomorrow, the anger expressed by the blogger would be understandable.  However, in this case, it is entirely the intensity level of the blogger that is outrageous, not the incompetence he perceives with facebook.com.

Author: amichail
Content:
I have tried to address (a) and (b) with more info in the yellow box.

Author: kevinxray
Title: The New Rules of Public Speaking

Author: vlad
Content: I'm surprised he's proud of any one of those points, let alone all of them.  But I think the true reason behind writing the article is to convince his readers, as well as himself, that he's doing this just to see what happens.

Author: webwright
Content: I'd love to get some insight on this as well.  I've started (and sold) two companies that were incorporated with a cheap-o incorporating service...  Did I just get lucky?
